Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Darmanian Way and Rosecrest Street.
Room.LongDescription: Darmanian Way runs along the northern border of Lyanden Lake, while Rosecrest Street forms the western border. In the center of the lake is a large island upon which the Lyanden Castle is built. The entrance to the castle is located off of Rosecrest Street to the south.
